description: Methods that list, add, and remove virtual network integrations from a webapp.

commands.name: az webapp vnet-integration add
commands.summary: Add a regional virtual network integration to a webapp.
examples: az webapp vnet-integration add -g MyResourceGroup -n MyWebapp --vnet MyVnetName --subnet MySubnetName -s [slot]

az webapp vnet-integration add -g MyResourceGroup -n MyWebapp --vnet /subscriptions/[SubscriptionId]/resourceGroups/[MyResourceGroup]/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/[MyVnetName] --subnet MySubnetName -s [slot]

az webapp vnet-integration add -g MyResourceGroup -n MyWebapp --vnet MyVnetName --subnet /subscriptions/[SubscriptionId]/resourceGroups/[MyResourceGroup]/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/[MyVnetName]/subnets/MySubnetName -s [slot]

commands.name: az webapp vnet-integration list
commands.summary: List the virtual network integrations on a webapp.
examples: az webapp vnet-integration list -g MyResourceGroup -n MyWebapp -s [slot]

commands.name: az webapp vnet-integration remove
commands.summary: Remove a regional virtual network integration from webapp.
examples: az webapp vnet-integration remove -g MyResourceGroup -n MyWebapp -s [slot]
